facet_1.name: Demon's Reach
facet_1.effects: Atrophy Aura stacks additionally grant Underlord's attack cleave damage.

facet_2.name: Abyssal Horde
facet_2.effects: Fiend's Gate additionally summons uncontrollable Abyssal Hordes at the portal that Underlord teleports to.

effects: Pit of Malice of the corresponding level are created under both portals
Enables casting Firestorm on allied units, with all ability effects centering and following the targeted ally around
Reduces both the instance interval and burn interval

abilities.name: Invading Force
abilities.description: Grants his allied heroes movement speed bonus and incoming damage reduction once their teleportation completes.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Fiend's Gate. Grants allied heroes a greater bonus upon warping through the Fiend's Gate.

abilities.name: Abyssal Horde
abilities.description: The Fiend's Gate additionally summons uncontrollable demonic minions on the portal that Underlord teleports to.
abilities.details: This ability levels up with Fiend's Gate. The summoned warriors and archers deal less damage to structures.

ability_1.name: Firestorm
ability_1.details: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the area-targeted location.
ability_1.description: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the area-targeted location.
technical_details: Max Health as Damage per Interval: 1.5%/2%/2.5%/3% (2.1%/2.6%/3.1%/3.6%)
interaction_notes: Both Roshan and the Tormentor are immune to the max health as damage component
All ability effects are applied immediately within the radius despite the visual effects

ability_2.name: Pit of Malice
ability_2.details: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted.
ability_2.description: A deadly pit is conjured at the target location; any unit that enters will be damaged and rooted. Each enemy unit within the pit are affected by cadence.
interaction_notes: Affects Fogged units and Invisible units
Multiple overlapping Pit of Malice do not stack

ability_3.name: Atrophy Aura
ability_3.details: Weakens enemy units' attack damage within the radius. If an enemy unit dies while under this gastric atrophy, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.
ability_3.description: Weakens enemy units' attack damage within the radius. If an enemy unit dies while under this gastric atrophy, Underlord gains temporary bonus damage.

facet_effects.demons_reach: Atrophy Aura grants Underlord's attack cleave damage with increased range per stack

technical_details: Attack Damage Bonus per Enemy Hero: 30/35/40/45
Attack Damage Bonus per Enemy Creep: 2/4/6/8
interaction_notes: Considers Meepo Clones as heroes, and creep-heroes as creeps
Break sources disable both the aura and buff stack gain

ability_4.name: Fiend's Gate
ability_4.details: Opens one portal next to Underlord another portal in the target location. Both portals have to be at least a certain distance away from each other. Heroes can channel a portal to teleport to the other side.
ability_4.description: Opens one portal next to Underlord another portal in the target location. Both portals have to be at least a certain distance away from each other. Heroes can channel a portal to teleport to the other side.
interaction_notes: Globally pings on all heroes' minimap upon cast
Interrupts Underlord's channeling abilities upon cast
Both portals have Spell Immunity buff
Cannot be placed in fountain area, Roshan's pit, or on impassable terrain

changes: Reduced Fiend's Gate mana cost from 200 to 175
CHANGED Necronomicon Warrior attack damage type from Default to Runty
CHANGED Necronomicon Archer attack damage type from Default to Piercing
CHANGED Atrophy Aura Demon's Reach buff dispel type from Death to None
LVL 10 +60 Firestorm radius â†’ +15s Atrophy Aura buff duration
LVL 20 +0.8% Firestorm max health as damage per second reduced to +0.6%
LVL 25 +0.5s Pit of Malice root duration reduced to +0.4s
